scripts.start: npm run mkdir:public && npm run build:all && npm run copy:all && npm run watch:all
scripts.mkdir:public: mkdir -p public && mkdir -p public/js && mkdir -p public/css && mkdir -p public/img && mkdir -p public/fonts
scripts.build:js: browserify src/app/index.js -o public/js/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ]
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:html && npm run copy:fonts && npm run copy:img
scripts.watch:js: watchify src/app/index.js -o public/js/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ]
scripts.watch:all: concurrently "npm run start:server"  "npm run watch:html" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:css"
